Being given a computer with no OS and being told to install Chrome
How do you install Chrome on a computer with no operating system?
How do you install Chrome on a computer with no operating system?
Run commands to install additional programs

Why did we use alpine as a base image?
Why do you use Windows, MacOS, or Ubuntu?
They come with a preinstalled set of programs that are useful to you!
Instruction telling Docker Server what to do
Run some commands to install additional programs
Specify a command to run on container startup
Hard drive segment for this process
dot specify build context (set of files and folders that we want to rap and encap in this container )

1. While running RUN command during the docker build process (as a 2nd step of the process) docker server get alpine base image and create temporary container
  2. After that docker server execute RUN command's contain as the primary process of that temporary container
  3. Then it download some dependancies (as a results of this we can belive new files or folders are added to the file sysytem of the alpine base image)
  4. After that docker server stop this temporary container and take a snapshot of it's file system and create temporary image file
  5. After that docker server create another temporary docker container and set its primary default command to "redis-server" and take a snap shot of file system of that 2nd temporary container and create redis docker image
Hard drive segment for this process
Create a container out of it
Take snapshot of that container's FS
Get image ready for next instruction
Create a container out of it
Tell container it should run 'redis-server' when started
Get image ready for next instruction
Output is the image generated from previous step
Specifies the directory of files/folders to use for the build
